elements.name: ct_justifyContent
elements.description: Defines how flex items are aligned along the main axis of the container

elements.name: ct_alignItems
elements.description: Specifies how flex items are aligned along the cross axis of the container.

elements.name: ct_flexDirection
elements.description: Establishes the main axis, determining the direction flex items are placed in the container.

elements.name: ct_flexDirection_5
elements.description: Establishes the main axis, determining the direction flex items are placed in the container.

elements.name: ct_flexWrap
elements.description: Controls whether flex items are forced onto a single line or can wrap onto multiple lines.

elements.name: ct_alignContent
elements.description: Aligns a flex container's lines within when there is extra space in the cross-axis.

elements.name: ct_gap
elements.description: Sets the gap between flex items in both row and column directions simultaneously.

elements.name: ct_rowGap
elements.description: Specifies the size of the gap between rows in the flex container.

elements.name: ct_columnGap
elements.description: Defines the size of the gap between columns in the flex container.

elements.name: ct_padding
elements.description: Sets the padding area on all four sides of the flex container.

elements.name: ct_borderWidth
elements.description: Determines the width of the border around the flex container.

elements.name: ct_borderColor
elements.description: Specifies the color of the border around the flex container.

elements.name: ct_backgroundColor
elements.description: Sets the background color of the flex container.

elements.name: ct_width
elements.description: Defines the width of the flex container, crucial for determining the layout space.

elements.name: ct_height
elements.description: Sets the height of the flex container, important for vertical space allocation.
